titleStmt.title: Two declarations of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament one, July 12, for the preservation and saftey of the kingdom, and the town of Hull : the other, July 13, concerning the miserable distractions and grievances this kingdom now lieth in, by means of Jesuiticall and wicked councellors now about His Majesty : with an order of both Houses of Parliament to ... to raise forces to suppresse all disturbers of the peace ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. Husbands and I. Franck,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
Each of the declarations was also published separately.
